abstract: United States Marine Lance Cpl Joseph Scott Pemberton testifies in court in Philippines that he choked Filipino Jennifer Laude until she ceased to move but was still breathing; denies killing Laude, who was transgender; Pemberton faces 40-year prison sentence if convicted of murder.
lead_paragraph: In his first public account, Lance Cpl. Joseph Scott Pemberton said that he choked a transgender woman but didn’t say he killed her, the prosecutor in the case said.

headline.main: U.S. Marine Testifies in Killing of Transgender Woman in Philippines
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Philippines: U.S. Marine Takes Stand in Killing of Transgender Woman

snippet: In his first public account, Lance Cpl. Joseph Scott Pemberton said that he choked a transgender woman but didn’t say he killed her, the prosecutor in the case said.
